forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West wind around 24 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind 17 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

weather_report:
In the brisk embrace of a San Francisco afternoon, the city gleams beneath a brilliant sun, the skies unblemished and clear, as though an artist has brushed away all clouds. The temperature may nestle comfortably around sixty-one degrees, yet a cool west wind whips through the streets, teasing jackets and hair alike. Despite the promise of warmth, expect a gentle descent in temperature as the afternoon meanders towards evening, with the air transforming into a canvas of subtle whispers of chill.

As the sun dips later into the horizon, the night will drape itself in partly cloudy skies, a soft blanket laced with a chill around fifty-two degrees. A light breeze persists, its playful gusts carrying whispers of maritime air. Dressed in layers—a light sweater or jacket against the evening chill—would be wise as you traverse the city’s charming, twisting streets. With a reassuring clarity to the day, consider taking a leisurely stroll along the waterfront, where the gentle lapping of waves can accompany your thoughts, or perhaps indulge in the warmth of a cozy café, letting the day fade softly into night, rich with the aroma of freshly brewed coffee mingling with the fresh ocean air.
